title: ice after error due to private type alias

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

body:
### Code ```Rust ``` ### Meta `rustc --version --verbose`: ``` rustc 1.57.0 (f1edd0429 2021-11-29) binary: rustc commit-hash: f1edd0429582dd29cccacaf50fd134b05593bd9c commit-date: 2021-11-29 host: x86_64-apple-darwin release: 1.57.0 LLVM version: 13.0.0 ``` ### Error output ``` $ cargo build Compiling magichawk v0.3.4 (/Users/mathiasritzmann/Library/magichawk/magichawk) error[E0603]: type alias `Printings` is private --> magichawk/src/bin/create_card_data.rs:1:16 | 1 | use magichawk::Printings; | ^^^^^^^^^ private type alias | note: the type alias `Printings` is defined here --> /Users/mathiasritzmann/Library/magichawk/magichawk/src/lib.rs:33:53 | 33 | insert_scryfall_object, query_scryfall_by_name, Printings, ScryfallCard, ScryfallCardNames, | ^^^^^^^^^ For more information about this error, try `rustc --explain E0603`. error: could not compile `magichawk` due to previous error warning: build failed, waiting for other jobs to finish... error[E0603]: type alias `Printings` is private --> magichawk/src/main.rs:229:38 | 229 | let bulk: magichawk::Printings = serde_json::from_reader(file_handle).unwrap(); | ^^^^^^^^^ private type alias | note: the type alias `Printings` is defined here --> /Users/mathiasritzmann/Library/magichawk/magichawk/src/lib.rs:33:53 | 33 | insert_scryfall_object, query_scryfall_by_name, Printings, ScryfallCard, ScryfallCardNames, | ^^^^^^^^^ thread 'rustc' panicked at 'called `Option::unwrap()` on a `None` value', compiler/rustc_metadata/src/rmeta/def_path_hash_map.rs:18:85 stack backtrace: 0: _rust_begin_unwind 1: core::panicking::panic_fmt 2: core::panicking::panic 3: rustc_metadata::rmeta::decoder::cstore_impl::::def_path_hash_to_def_id 4: ::def_path_hash_to_def_id 5: rustc_middle::dep_graph::dep_node:: for rustc_span::def_id::DefId>::recover 6: rustc_query_impl::query_callbacks::adt_def::force_from_dep_node 7: rustc_query_system::dep_graph::graph::DepGraph::try_mark_previous_green 8: rustc_query_system::dep_graph::graph::DepGraph::try_mark_previous_green 9: rustc_query_system::dep_graph::graph::DepGraph::try_mark_green 10: rustc_query_system::query::plumbing::try_load_from_disk_and_cache_in_memory 11: rustc_query_system::query::plumbing::try_execute_query 12: ::unsafety_check_result 13: ::visit_rvalue 14: rustc_mir_transform::check_unsafety::unsafety_check_result 15: core::ops::function::FnOnce::call_once 16: rustc_query_system::dep_graph::graph::DepGraph::with_task 17: rustc_data_structures::stack::ensure_sufficient_stack 18: rustc_query_system::query::plumbing::try_execute_query 19: rustc_query_system::query::plumbing::force_query_impl 20: rustc_query_impl::query_callbacks::unsafety_check_result::force_from_dep_node 21: rustc_query_system::dep_graph::graph::DepGraph::try_mark_previous_green 22: rustc_query_system::dep_graph::graph::DepGraph::try_mark_previous_green 23: rustc_query_system::dep_graph::graph::DepGraph::try_mark_previous_green 24: rustc_query_system::dep_graph::graph::DepGraph::try_mark_previous_green 25: rustc_query_system::dep_graph::graph::DepGraph::try_mark_green 26: rustc_query_system::query::plumbing::try_load_from_disk_and_cache_in_memory 27: rustc_query_system::query::plumbing::try_execute_query 28: ::type_of 29: rustc_typeck::check::check::check_item_type 30: rustc_middle::hir::map::Map::visit_item_likes_in_module 31: rustc_typeck::check::check::check_mod_item_types 32: rustc_query_system::dep_graph::graph::DepGraph::with_task 33: rustc_data_structures::stack::ensure_sufficient_stack 34: rustc_query_system::query::plumbing::try_execute_query 35: ::check_mod_item_types 36: rustc_middle::hir::map::Map::for_each_module 37: rustc_typeck::check_crate 38: rustc_interface::passes::analysis 39: rustc_query_system::dep_graph::graph::DepGraph::with_task 40: rustc_data_structures::stack::ensure_sufficient_stack 41: rustc_query_system::query::plumbing::try_execute_query 42: ::analysis 43: rustc_interface::passes::QueryContext::enter 44: rustc_interface::queries::::enter 45: rustc_span::with_source_map 46: scoped_tls::ScopedKey::set note: Some details are omitted, run with `RUST_BACKTRACE=full` for a verbose backtrace. error: internal compiler error: unexpected panic note: the compiler unexpectedly panicked. this is a bug. note: we would appreciate a bug report: https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/new?labels=C-bug%2C+I-ICE%2C+T-compiler&template=ice.md note: rustc 1.57.0 (f1edd0429 2021-11-29) running on x86_64-apple-darwin note: compiler flags: -C embed-bitcode=no -C split-debuginfo=unpacked -C debuginfo=2 -C incremental --crate-type bin note: some of the compiler flags provided by cargo are hidden query stack during panic: #0 [unsafety_check_result] unsafety-checking `card_names_full::{closure#0}` #1 [unsafety_check_result] unsafety-checking `card_names_full` #2 [type_of] computing type of `card_names_full::{opaque#0}` #3 [check_mod_item_types] checking item types in top-level module #4 [analysis] running analysis passes on this crate end of query stack error: build failed ```
Backtrace
